content:
TITLE: Setting Up Environment Variables for Testing
DESCRIPTION: Example .env file configuration for testing the SDK. Contains various Kinde-specific settings needed for authentication testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
KINDE_AUDIENCE=your_kinde_api
KINDE_CLIENT_ID=your_kinde_client_id // Please use an application with password method
KINDE_CLIENT_SECRET=your_kinde_client_secret
KINDE_COOKIE_DOMAIN=// domain to assign cookie to
KINDE_ISSUER_URL=https://your_kinde_domain.kinde.com
KINDE_POST_LOGIN_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:4173
KINDE_POST_LOGOUT_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:4173
KINDE_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:4173/api/auth/kinde_callback
KINDE_SCOPE=profile email offline openid
KINDE_USER_EMAIL_TEST= // An user has existed in your organization
KINDE_USER_PASSWORD_TEST=
KINDE_AUTH_WITH_PKCE= // Set `true` if you want to use Authentication Code Flow with PKCE
KINDE_DEBUG= // Set `true` if you want to enable the `api/auth/health` endpoint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including the SDK in an Existing Project's package.json
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration to add the locally packed Kinde SvelteKit SDK to an existing project's dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
     ...
     "dependencies": {
         "@kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk": "file:kinde-oss-kinde-sveltekit-sdk-<version>.tgz",
         ...
     }
     ...
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running SDK Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute the test suite for the Kinde SvelteKit SDK after setting up the environment variables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Local Package from the SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to pack the SDK for local installation in another project. The example shows how to reference a local SDK folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm pack <path-to-sdk-folder>
// e.g.
npm pack ~/Documents/Projects/kinde-sveltekit-sdk
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Development
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all the required dependencies for the Kinde SvelteKit SDK project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the Kinde SvelteKit SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the SDK after implementing modifications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Playwright for Testing
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install Playwright browsers for testing the SDK. You can install all browsers or just a specific one like Chromium.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
// https://playwright.dev/docs/library#key-differences

npx playwright install
// for a single one
npx playwright install chromium
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Kinde SvelteKit SDK Repository
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the Kinde SvelteKit SDK repository to your local machine.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Navigating to the Project Directory
DESCRIPTION: Command to change directory to the cloned Kinde SvelteKit SDK project folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kinde-oss/kinde-sveltekit-sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd kinde-sveltekit-sdk
```
